# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: 1.1
my_variable:
  multi: true
  default:
    - val1
    - val2
my_calculated_variable:
  multi: true
  default:
    variable: _.my_variable
    optional: true
```

| **my_variable**<br/>[`string`](https://rougail.readthedocs.io/en/latest/variable.html#variables-types) `standard` `obligatoire` `unique` `multiple`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | My_variable.<br/>**Défaut**: <br/>- val1<br/>- val2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
